caption.text: This is a map of Boston in 1769.
caption.title: The City of Boston

caption.text: Throughout much of Boston's history, the North End has been one of the most prominent neighborhoods in the city. During the mid to late eighteenth century, it served as the neighborhood of Paul Revere and the historical Old North Church.
caption.title: The North End

caption.text: Here, just off Garden Court, was where Thomas Hutchinson's ancestral home was located.
caption.title: Hutchinson's Mansion
